CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a material name, specifically a type of polymer (PS) called PSFDTBT.
2. PC71BM: This is also a material name, specifically a material called PC71BM.
3. Polymer solar cells: This is a category or type of cells, but it doesn't specify a particular material.
4. Spirobifluorene: This is a class or type of material, specifically a type of organic compound called spirobifluorene.
5. BHJ PSCs: This stands for Bulk Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells, which is a type of solar cell technology. It doesn't directly refer to a specific material, but it's important to note that the materials mentioned earlier (PSFDTBT and PC71BM) are used in this type of solar cell.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. Spirobifluorene

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a specific type of polymer, so it can be considered a "Polymer Name" entity.
2. PC71BM: This is also a specific type of polymer, so it can be considered a "Polymer Name" entity.
3. PCE: This stands for "Power Conversion Efficiency," so it can be considered a "Property Name" entity.
4. 0.94 V: This is a voltage value, so it can be considered a "Property Name" entity.
5. open - circuit voltage: This is a property or characteristic of a device, so it can be considered a "Property Name" entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency (Property Name)
2. 0.94 V: Open circuit voltage (Property Name)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |
| Open circuit voltage (0.94 V) |
| Open circuit voltage (open - circuit voltage) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: It stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a property value representing the ability of a solar cell to convert sunlight into electricity.
2. 0.94 V: It is the Open Circuit Voltage (Voc) of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM based polymer solar cells. Open Circuit Voltage is another property value that indicates the maximum voltage that can be generated by the solar cell under ideal conditions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
